title: A Disastrous Night for the Democrats # 1034 (Ep 1034)
description:
In this episode I address the Democrats’ disastrous debate last night in Michigan and the fallout from it. I also address some troubling statistics which back up President Trump’s fight against Baltimore’s political corruption. Finally, I address another huge break in the Spygate case. 

News Picks:Radical Liberals Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren got crushed in the Democrats’ debate.



John Solomon’s stunning new piece about continued FBI stonewalling is an eye opener.



The Democrats lose, again, on their collusion hoax.



Baltimore liberals wasted 1.8 billion taxpayer dollars.



President Trump nails the Washington Post. 



Increasing the minimum wage could cost us up to 1.3 million jobs.



The Green New Deal would cost your household a staggering amount of money. 



Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
